title: Donguri no Ie
synopsis: The Takazis' only daughter named Keiko was born seriously handicapped, deaf and dumb and mentally handicapped. Her parents tried to accept her handicap but their suffering continued.
staff: [['Annou, Takashi', ['Director']], ['Yuasa, Masaaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Fujimori, Masaya', ['Animation Director']], ['Yanagida, Yoshiaki', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']]]
